definition: variant of 那麼|那么[na4 me5]
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: They asked me so many questions that they confused me.
sentences.chinese: 他们问我那末多问题把我都弄胡涂了。

sentences.english: You're leaving so early for your office?
Drink plenty of water and have a good rest, then.
sentences.chinese: 那末，请多喝点水，好好苏息。

sentences.english: So how have people’s thoughts and views on sex changed since the dawn of the digital age? Glad you asked!
sentences.chinese: 那末，数字时代的人类性观念有何改变呢？

sentences.english: Then finish the last song and let us leave.
sentences.chinese: 那末最后一曲终了就让我们启程吧。

sentences.english: It was insane to take the boat on the sea in that storm.
sentences.chinese: 那末大的风暴乘划子出海，的确是疯了。

sentences.english: Then what principle should we apply to guide the new international relations?
sentences.chinese: 那末应当用什么原则来指导新的国际关系呢？

sentences.english: How, then, do we arrive at the idea ofabsolute equality?
sentences.chinese: 那末，我们是怎么达到绝对相等的观念的呢？

sentences.english: Nevertheless, it stood through a great many hasty-puddings.
sentences.chinese: 煮过那末多玉米糊了，房屋还是好好的站着呢。

sentences.english: "You ought to take lessons right away then, " replied Lester genially .
sentences.chinese: “那末你应该马上就学起来，”雷斯脱和蔼地说。

sentences.english: Theyve built so many new office buildings here that they have trouble renting out all the space.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这儿盖了那末多的办公楼，现在都租不出去。

sentences.english: Then while you play, you will feel more relaxed and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 那末当你游玩时，你会觉得比较轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The that end old glory definitely knows that probably he tells a lie.
sentences.chinese: 那末老荣一定知道，可能他说谎。

sentences.english: However, exercise is far from dancing for it's in lack of smooth moving and emotional expression_r_r.
sentences.chinese: 可是，广播体操不像跳舞那末运动自若富有表现力。

sentences.english: If thou didst not, thou wouldst not have fulfilled and proclaimed His mission.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不这样做，那末，你就是没有传达他的使命。

sentences.english: He should never drink that much alcohol in public.
sentences.chinese: 他不该该在公家场合喝那末多酒。

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
to calculate (using bamboo tokens on a counting board)/to count beads/fig. to budget/to plan (an investment)
variant of 擔憂|担忧[dan1 you1]
